title: Ai Daro
description:
Can happiness be found in the delicate balance between passion and love? Twins Shun and Shu have had no luck in love. However, a chance encounter reunites former lovers Shu and Naomichi after their breakup of three years ago. While the two had a budding relationship in the past, things fell apart and they went their separate ways. Now, fate brings them back together once again. Could it be that relationship that they once shared in the past is what they have been looking for all along? Can they both find the meaning of real love?

[b]Includes story, 2 chapters long, called [i]Love Star[/i].[/b]

matches.title: Come to the Orchard in the Spring
